scenes.background: (Bob) shakes his head while (Monica) crosses her arms, looking displeased.
scenes.description: 'If we can't rely on each other, how do we expect to get anything done?'

options.text: We need to build stronger teamwork. Let's have a session to address this.
options.analysis: You suggested improving teamwork through a session, showing good perception and social skills, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I understand your frustration, but we need to focus on finding a solution.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the frustration but steered the conversation towards finding a solution, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: It's not about relying on each other; it's about everyone stepping up and doing their part.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, indicating lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might strain relationships with colleagues.
